website_summaries.verdict: Despite a handful of complaints about the shoe’s sizing, the Ryka Klick was considered a comfortable and supportive walker. It also provided a secure foothold and was found to be visually appealing by many female purchasers.
pros: Many buyers praised the Ryka Klick for being a comfortable everyday walking shoe
Most wearers liked the elastic criss-cross straps on top of the trainer: they kept the foot secured yet allowed for an easy on-and-off action
The style and color options received a lot of compliments from the reviewers
Several users appreciated that the footwear accommodated swollen feet, custom orthotics, and bandages
Some customers reported that their arch felt duly supported by the shoe
cons: A few purchasers wrote that lengthwise, the trainer ran about a full size big

customer_reviews.title: Get these shoes right now!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other Rukas before and not been particularly in love. These shoes, however, are perfect. So perfect that I bought three pairs in different colors. The elastic crisscross on the top keep my feet in securely, and the insole is remarkable, helps dupport my arch and also helps with those of us who overpronate. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lilia P Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: They're a tiny bit tight across the widest part of my foot, but they're still extremely comfortable. I walked a convention floor for days in these and they held up - my feet weren't killing me by the end of each day. I like that they're more stylish than regular sneakers. I also like that Ryka is a brand that focuses on women. Gret price for some great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, was able to wear them when other shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, was able to wear them when other shoes caused too much pain after work (plantar fasciitis or something). The arch support is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ☆Megan☆

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I marked this as somewhat small, but that's actually misleading---this was simply an incredibly uncomfortable shoe for me. Maybe it works for others, but not for my elderly wide foot. i was really disappointed to have to send this back, but knew within seconds that I would not be able to walk in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, slip on easily and great style
customer_reviews.text: These run slightly large. I wear an 8 and probably could have gotten a 7 1/2. Super comfy, slip on easily and great style.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johanna, Lexington, Mi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I bought pairs in blue and purple. I bought my normal size 9 and they fit well without socks. They have good cushioning and very good arch support. The stretch bands on the top are smooth and don't pinch. Would be great for airplane travel. Lots of compliments, too, especially on the purple color, which is a deep blackberry color.
customer_reviews.author: K. ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Ryka sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I did like the fit and comfort. I purchased this model to avoid laces and for a tad bit more dressy appearance than a walking shoe or cross trainer. I think I would have liked the option of a more solid color rather than the enhancing stripe shown in all colors. I have only worn them once so can not vouch for sturdiness or longevity of color and shape. Ryka has always fit me well and I hope these will be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Threats o. his life lead go an unexpected connection  to family previosly unknown. a journey to s.e

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and roomy enough for inserts
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit and the look, wish the toe area was a little more roomy but otherwise a perfect fit in wide. Support is good and with added inserts completely cures my plantar fascia.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Slip-On style that has built in arch support
customer_reviews.text: Easy, Slip-On style that has built in arch support. The shoe is stylish and comfortable. Will be nice for travel
customer_reviews.author: Gmar

customer_reviews.title: I like them alot otherwise
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has rigid sides and is producing blisters on my feet at the pinkie but it is not tight... I think the sides are just too stiff. I have been wearing then for awhile.... wish they were less rigid.. I like them alot otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: lmw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good for my over onatiing
customer_reviews.text: I wore them straight out of the box, and they were comfortable and supported my arch well. I could have gotten a wide and they might have better, but because of the three points to adjust, I was able to wear the medium. My only complaint is that there could have been longer Velcro to have a more secure closing for my slightly wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L.

customer_reviews.title: Way too big.
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a pair of RYKA water shoes which I loved and fit great in a size 8. So I thought I'd try another RYKA shoe. Unfortunately, these were so big as to be unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit shoes
customer_reviews.text: Something went wrong. These shoes are cute but, they are way too large in every direction.
customer_reviews.author: V.J.M

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice style but size was way too big. One insole was missing and I had to buy heel inserts to keep the heels from slipping off my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Cornhusker

customer_reviews.title: Okay if wide foot
customer_reviews.text: The elastic strap was too large and rubbed the top of foot. The length was just off a bit on my foot. Sent back
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Blister maker.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the way the elastic criss cross was attached. It gave me blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Ginna

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable wear
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable so far. It will mostly be worn for work and some casual. This is my second pair of Rykas and I fell in love with my first pair and had to have another!! They're perfect for being on my feet most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: muitobem

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka, having bought my first pair about a year ago, I now own 6 different pairs. I have flat feet and there seems to be more arch support in this style or at least a stronger feeling support.
customer_reviews.author: MelD

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Just a bit long but afraid 1/2 might be small third runs brand I’ve purchased and like them last Mary Janes were too short sent back and they did not have arch support at all we’ll see
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Had been n navy and liked them so well I came back for plum. Good arch support, cute styling.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Ordered normal size and it’s much too loose. Really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Judy M Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were comfortable from the first time I wore them. They have quickly become my go to shoe for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but.......
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. They look like clod hoppers to me. Not too flattering. I'll probably just wear them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Strazis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.. have another pair of this shows that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable..have another pair of this shows that fit well but this pair fits big
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great for wearing around the house and for short trips out but not necessarily for large numbers of steps. Fit as expected. Decent support. Like the padded heel.
customer_reviews.author: P Ruck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Easy slip on and off. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: I buy

customer_reviews.title: ORDERED MY SIZE, BUT THESE RUN LARGE
customer_reviews.text: THEY WERE TOO FLOPPY ON MY FOOT WITH NO WAY TO ADJUST ACROSS INSTEP. SENT THEM BACK.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Soft inside. True to fit. Perfect gym shoe without any laces!
customer_reviews.author: gbird

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and very comfortable. Can be used as a house shoe and does well as a outdoor walking shoe with a nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Strand

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit, good style
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for wide feet and high arches. Also fantastic for sciatica!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Cute but not as cute as pictured. Just didn’t fit my foot. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: SDY

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I order a size 9,it was too big seems like it was a size 10 1/2 had to return it and took a size 8
customer_reviews.author: nicky

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have them in two colors. Very comfortable with good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt

customer_reviews.title: fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so very comfortable and a great price also
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Latocha

customer_reviews.title: and this one doesn't disappoint. The color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Luv RYKA shoes, and this one doesn't disappoint. The color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RYKA Women's klick Sneaker
product_meta.description: The klick combines the openness of a sandal, with the structure of a sneaker for the ultimate in warm weather casual style. A softly padded comfort collar and soft satin gore keep her comfortable all day long.
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh with synthetic overlays and satin gore cross bands.

Rubber outsole that wraps up the forefoot offers stability and pivot point allows for easy transitions. Strategic cut outs in the rubber provide traction and durability while keeping the shoe lightweight
